text:
Maxwell Labs | Amsterdam, The Netherlands | Front-end | Onsite | Full-time | Visa

Maxwell is building the leading platform for conversational commerce. Our first product, an intuitive chatbot builder, is already being used by marketeers at multiple brands such as Hellofresh, Takeaway.com, Catawiki, NS International.

We are looking for a skilled front end developer to join us in building the next generation of our builder. We're a team of two backenders, a frontender and a business developer working out of a beautiful office on the Herengracht in the center of Amsterdam.

Tech stack: Python, AMQP, MongoDB, React, Redux, Docker

Learn more about the position here: https://angel.co/maxwell-ai/jobs/287296-senior-frontend-deve...

We are also hiring for other positions (design, machine learning, back-end): https://angel.co/maxwell-ai/jobs

Questions? Want to apply? Reach me at gaganpreet@maxwell.ai
